alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:50PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer, west central Oglala Lakota and northeastern Fall River Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 150 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads, or 21 miles east of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dry Wood Housing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Oglala Lakota
